data.author: MicroByte

changelog.release_notes:
Pebill has moved to somewhere with less Earthquakes.  

(New Pebill actions coming soon!)
Format time based on your time preference, sorry about that!

More bug's were crushed, sprayed and trapped.
Also added a mysterious late night visitor to the mix.

Ooops! PEBILL's house apparently had a few bugs running around in it. This release should address some of those issues. 

PEBILL says thanks for all the love so far!

+ Some users were having trouble reading the time.  Since this is a watchface, time is important to be able to read.  We made it readable.  
+ Also removed the PEBILL Logo since that caused rage.

+ New Future States 
+ Shaken but not stirred?

data.description:
tl;dr -  Think of him as a virtual Sea Monkey, but just don't call him that!

Meet PEBILL!  PEBILL might be the first virtual buddy on a watch, but for legal reasons, we're really not 100% sure of that.  

What we do know is that PEBILL lives his day to day virtual life doing what a virtual person might do if he were real, even celebrating special weekdays and holidays throughout the year!   This is what we imagined a virtual person might do, but we're probably wrong, it was worth a shot.

PEBILL works, plays and lives in his virtual world for you to watch and enjoy, which is pretty creepy when you think about it.  

PEBILL doesn't ask for much, only that you feed him every couple of days if you can remember.  Don't worry though, he'll remind you when you forget!

So how much would you pay for a virtual buddy that goes wherever your Pebble goes? How about nothing, that seems fair to us. 

Be sure to share the love by hitting the heart above...  or else PEBILL will have to cry himself to sleep at night.

PEBILL is compatible with the Original Pebble, Pebble Steel and Pebble Time.
data.title: PEBILL
